getBusinessCategoriesSql: SELECT ID, NAME, ICON, SORT FROM (SELECT * FROM BUSINESS_CATEGORY_PRESET WHERE ID NOT IN (SELECT ID FROM BUSINESS_CATEGORY_USER) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM BUSINESS_CATEGORY_USER) ORDER BY SORT
saveBusinessCategoriesSql: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO BUSINESS_CATEGORY_USER (ID,NAME,ICON,SORT) VALUES (@id,@name,@icon,@sort)
getPlaceholdersSql: SELECT PG.ID PGID ,PG.NAME PGNAME ,PH.ID PHID ,PH.NAME PHNAME FROM PLACEHOLDER_GROUP PG INNER JOIN BC_PHGRP_REL BPR ON BPR.GID = PG.ID LEFT JOIN PH_GROUP_ITEM_REL GIR ON GIR.GID = PG.ID LEFT JOIN PLACEHOLDER_ITEM PH ON PH.ID = GIR.PHID WHERE BPR.BCID = @businessCategoryId ORDER BY GIR.SORT
getTemplateSql: SELECT NAME, PATH FROM TEMPLETE TPL LEFT JOIN BC_TPL_REL BTR ON TPL.ID = BTR.TPLID WHERE BTR.BCID = @businessCategoryId
